sections.heading: testacy proceedings; partial intestacy
sections.text: If it becomes evident in the course of a formal testacy proceeding that, though one or more instruments are entitled to be probated, the decedent's estate is or may be partially intestate, the court shall enter an order to that effect.SourceLaws 1974, LB 354, ยง

30-2435.Formal testacy proceedings; partial intestacy.

If it becomes evident in the course of a formal testacy proceeding that, though one or more instruments are entitled to be probated, the decedent's estate is or may be partially intestate, the court shall enter an order to that effect.

SourceLaws 1974, LB 354, ยง 113, UPC ยง 3-411.
